programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: O Dólar Furado, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do século 19. Gary O'Hara é um ex-capitão do Exército dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: Com a Corda no Pescoço, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Condenado à forca, Henry Moon é capturado enquanto tentava fugir para o México, mas descobre que existe uma lei local que perdoa os crimes de quem se casa com uma mulher solteira ou viúva.

programme.title: Gringo, Reze para Morrer, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: À frente de uma dúzia de bandidos, dois irmãos mantêm a pequena cidade de White City sob controle. Finalmente, porém, um caçador de recompensas, com a ajuda de um aleijado, tenta libertar White City de seus ferozes opressores.

programme.title: Um Homem Dificil de Matar, (2003, Western)
programme.desc: Na fase final do Velho Oeste, um grupo de cowboys liderado por Monte enfrenta o envelhecimento e a falta de oportunidade oriunda do desuso de sua profissão.

programme.title: ESTREIA - O Preço de um Covarde, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Um excelente drama sobre crime, punição e justiça à moda do faroeste. NO velho oeste americano duas personalidades colidem em Val Verde, Texas, quando os irmãos Bishop, têm que juntar suas forças para a escapar de uma sentença de morte.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba é colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rápido do mundo e explodirá caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: Em rota de colisão, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas russos sequestra um avião americano e planeja derrubá-lo em uma usina nuclear perto de Washington D.C. Cabe à tripulação e aos passageiros do voo, a missão de impedi-los antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: O Ataque dos Tubarões, (2022, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Grandes tubarões brancos atacam um barco de pesca que se encontra a quilômetros da costa, obrigando os membros da tripulação a lutarem por suas vidas.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: O irmão mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Iggy foge para o rio após se ferir gravemente na luta contra Petto Shoppu, mas não dá sinais de que vai desistir.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo são recebidos na porta da mansão de DIO por um mordomo chamado D’Arby, que alega ser irmão mais novo de D’Arby, o apostador.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 1

programme.title: Polnareff e Iggy vão com tudo para destruir DIO, mas o terrível vampiro Cool Ice ataca os dois de surpresa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 2

programme.title: Gravemente ferido, Iggy usa suas últimas forças para salvar Polnareff, que aproveita para ferir Cool Ice na cabeça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin quer revelar a identidade do Stand de DIO, e para isso usa seu próprio Stand em um ataque concentrado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO usa seu Stand e consegue parar o tempo, mas quando vai atacar, percebe que os dedos de Jotaro estão se mexendo. Quem vencerá esta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO contempla sua vitória. Enfurecido, Jotaro enfrenta seu inimigo em uma batalha final. O cenário? Um mundo em que o tempo está congelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O adeus da longa jornada, amigos

programme.title: Jotaro Kujo vai para a cidade de Morioh à procura de Josuke Higashikata. Ele vê alguém que acaba sendo Josuke se desculpando com uns valentões.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Angelo consegue entrar no corpo das pessoas. Apesar de Jotaro avisar para não consumirem nada, Josuke surpreende a mãe tomando um gole de café.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: Um Conto Sobre o Tempo, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Neste conto de fadas, Urban é um aprendiz de relojoeiro que segue os passos de seu corajoso mestre, Apbán, e parte em uma ousada jornada para encontrar um relógio com o poder de avisar a quem o possui sobre sua própria morte.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança, (2012, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memórias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templários.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Caçador de Dragões, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois que o pai de Will é morto por um dragão, ele embarca em uma jornada épica para se vingar do monstro .

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Clube da Luta, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch, (1955, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life. The beautiful but ditsy blond (Marilyn Monroe) from the apartment above his catches his eye.

programme.title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole, (1951, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy, including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers Of Benghazi, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay, 13 HOURS is the gripping true story of six elite ex-military operators assigned to protect the CIA who fought back against overwhelming odds when terrorists attacked a U.S. diplomatic compound on September 11, 2012.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Platoon, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: The film probes the psyche of the young soldiers who fought in Vietnam. Their camaraderie, their struggle for survival amid terrifying violence and madness of combat.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers Of Benghazi, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay, 13 HOURS is the gripping true story of six elite ex-military operators assigned to protect the CIA who fought back against overwhelming odds when terrorists attacked a U.S. diplomatic compound on September 11, 2012.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: Darkness, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror film, from the director of [REC], a teenage girl (Anna Paquin) moves into a remote countryside house with her family, soon discovering horribly disturbing truths about the old place.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: Darkness, (2002, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Inside a shadowy St. Moritz hotel, danger leaves Joseph and Lisa Lisa no time to mourn as they follow a bloody trail to Wamuu and Kars. Luckily, Lisa Lisa manages to strike a deal—but, of course, with one condition.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph and Wamuu finally face off in an equestrian one-on-one. But will Joseph’s adroit attacks and weapon-grasping prowess be enough to keep Wamuu’s millennia-old pride in check?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Warrior of Wind
programme.desc: When the battle between Wamuu and Joseph comes to a head, the surprising confessions aren’t far behind. Now the final hour has come for Lisa Lisa and Kars—a fighter very different from his fellow Pillar Men.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ties that Bind JoJo
programme.desc: With Lisa Lisa’s life on the line, Joseph must deceive the deceiver. Joining Joseph, Stroheim and Speedwagon arrive at the battlefield, where a family tragedy threatens to doom the world to a hopeless future.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Birth of a Superbeing
programme.desc: Having seized the Red Stone and the mask, Kars has become the Ultimate Being. Now the seemingly invincible entity has his sights solely on Joseph who, fleeing, has one final trick up his sleeve.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ascendant One
programme.desc: Deep within a volcano’s molten lava, Kars contemplates a comeback. But with the Red Stone’s power unleashed, both warriors are launched into the stratosphere of the unknown.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
programme.desc: Japan, 1987. Jotaro Kujo, a descendant of the Joestar family, is in prison and claims he is being possessed by an evil spirit. His grandfather, Joseph Joestar, immediately departs for Japan, where he must reveal the family's terrible secret.
programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Who Will Be the Judge!?
programme.desc: Jotaro returns to his normal life while keeping his "Stand" power a secret. But on the way to school one day he meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin and sustains a strange injury.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Curse of DIO
programme.desc: Jotaro defeats Kakyoin with his Stand power, but as he attempts to glean information from his adversary about DIO, Joseph notices a sinister connection.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Tower of Grey
programme.desc: The Joestars must defeat DIO within 50 days or Holly's life is forfeit. With no time to lose, they head for Egypt where DIO is thought to be hiding but end up encountering a new threat along the way.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon decides to go to Kukuroo Mountain to bring Killua back.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Determined to see Killua, Gon and the others say that they are Killua's friends, and ask the guard to relay that message...

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: To be able to see Killua, Gon and friends choose to go through the Testing Gate.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Thanks to Canary's help, Gon and the others get closer to the mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends meet the butler Gotoh who proposes a game to see if they are worthy enough to be friends with Killua.
programme.sub-title: Can't See x If x You're Blind

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Aunt Mito receives another letter from Gon!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua fights Zushi and senses his strange technique is similar to the one used by Illumi.
programme.sub-title: Arrival x At x The Arena

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zushi's mentor, Wing, tells Gon and Killua about the existence of something known as Nen.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: In order to break down Hisoka's Nen barrier, Gon and Killua ask Wing to let them awaken their Nen abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon's first battle in the Heaven's Arena on the 200th story is against Gido, a Nen user.

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A mockumentary chronicling the rise and fall of NWH, a not particularly talented--or particularly bright but always controversial--hip-hop group.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: Pootie Tang, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Pootie’s one-man war against greed, injustice, and unwholesome consumer products starts cutting into profits at LecterCorp, the company’s demented CEO plunges him into a super-funk, by swiping his magical belt!

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: When millionaire control freak Christian Black introduces college student Hannah Steele to his world of “romance,” their hilariously kinky relationship stumbles forward despite Christian's shortcomings and the crazy antics of their friends.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)

programme.desc: Regina Hall (Girls Trip) stars as the manager of a "sports bar with curves." She runs the joint like a family, but over the course of one challenging day her incurable optimism is tested by sketchy employees, bad customers and an even worse boss.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing he’s got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Bloodfist VIII: Hard Way Out, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Kickboxing champion Jake Raye thought his fighting days were over, until a call from an old friend draws him to the Far East and into the hands of a madman.

programme.title: Blackbelt, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Ex-cop protects a singer from a psycho serial killer.

programme.title: Crime Story [Cantonese-Language Version], (1993, Action)
programme.desc: A Special Agent is assigned to protect a wealthy business magnate. However, when the businessman is kidnapped in a daring ambush, he teams up with a seasoned detective to crack the case. But soon he discovers the case isn't that simple.

programme.title: City Hunter, (1993, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Extremely silly comedy about a self-indulgent private investigator who winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

programme.title: The Protector, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Two New York cops, Billy Wong and Danny Garoni, head to Hong Kong after the daughter of a rich businessman is kidnapped by the drug lord, Mr. Ko.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In 1905, revolutionist Sun Yat-Sen visits Hong Kong to discuss plans with Tongmenghui members to overthrow the Qing dynasty. But when they find out that assassins have been sent to kill him, they assemble a group of protectors to prevent any attacks.

programme.title: True Legend, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Su Qi-Er retired from his life as a renowned Qing dynasty general in order to pursue his dream of a family and his own martial arts school.

programme.title: The Swordsman [Cantonese-Language Version], (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A kung-fu manual known as the sacred scroll is stolen from the Emperor's library. An army detachment is sent to recover it. Meanwhile, a young swordsman and his fellow disciple are accidentally drawn into the chaos.

programme.title: Swordsman II [Cantonese-Language Version], (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Ling Wu Chung decides to hide from the chaotic world. Before leaving, he visits his friends, a tribe of snake-wielding women warriors. However, he finds that the tribe have been attacked, and their leader Yam Ying Ying has been abducted.

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)

programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: Canadian Bacon, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Falling approval ratings and a sagging economy, cause a desperate U.S. president to turn America against its most unlikely enemy, Canada. A Niagara Falls sheriff and his band of misfit deputies invade Canada leaving the President's plans in shambles.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)

programme.title: Joe Dirt, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Joe Dirt is a janitor with a mullet, acid-washed jeans, and a dream -- to find the parents he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was a belligerent, trailer park-raised kid. Now, the irrepressibly optimistic Joe hits the road in search of his folks.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: Autumn In New York, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: Autumn in New York follows the sexual exploits of Will Keane (RICHARD GERE) until he runs into an unexpected dead end when he meets Charlotte Fielding (WINONA RYDER). Charlotte is half Will's age and twice his match.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: Loner Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) enters Officer Candidate School to become a Navy pilot and in thirteen torturous weeks, he learns the importance of discipline, love, and friendship.

programme.title: Terms of Endearment, (1983, Drama)
programme.desc: Terms of Endearment dazzled critics and audiences alike with its believable, insightful story of two captivating people, mother and daughter, unforgettably played by Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger.

programme.title: At First Sight, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: AT FIRST SIGHT is the story of a young woman architect who falls in love with a blind man. She encourages him to undergo a radical operation to restore his sight, but ultimately his truest vision comes from the love he finds in his heart.

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Return to Me, (2000, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: Loner Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) enters Officer Candidate School to become a Navy pilot and in thirteen torturous weeks, he learns the importance of discipline, love, and friendship.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young Hannibal moves in with his aunt and begins plotting revenge after his baby sister is killed during World War II. Based on Thomas Harris' novel.

programme.title: The Gunman, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Eight years after a successful assassination, a former mercenary finds himself the target of hit squads hired to ensure his silence.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Limitless, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: The Grey, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a plane crash leaves him stranded in the Alaskan wilderness, a sharpshooter (Liam Neeson) tries to lead fellow survivors to safety despite forbidding conditions and a pack of ferocious wolves.

programme.title: Primal Fear, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me, (2000, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of the Best Picture and Best Screenplay awards at the 2000 Sundance Film Festival, "You Can Count on Me" has been hailed as "the best American movie this year."*

programme.title: The Doors, (1991, Musical)
programme.desc: Jim Morrison, one of the most sensual figures in the history of rock and roll, explodes on the screen in “THE DOORS,” the electrifying movie about a time called the sixties and a legendary outlaw who rocked America’s consciousness – forever.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me, (2000, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of the Best Picture and Best Screenplay awards at the 2000 Sundance Film Festival, "You Can Count on Me" has been hailed as "the best American movie this year."*

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: Gunless, (2010, Western)
programme.desc: An American gunslinger is repeatedly thwarted in his attempts to mount a showdown in a friendly town in Canada where no one seems to understand or appreciate the brutal code of the American Wild West.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Drama)
programme.desc: The fate of mankind rests in the hands of a teenager (Matthew Broderick) who accidentally taps into the Defense Department's tactical computer. Dabney Coleman and Ally Sheedy co-star.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Push, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Superhumans defy a government plot to harness and abuse their powers. Chris Evans and Dakota Fanning (the TWILIGHT films) team in a pulse-pounding paranormal thriller.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Irma La Douce, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Set in Paris' famous Red Light district, a rookie policeman (Jack Lemmon) plots to keep a beautiful prostitute (Shirley MacLaine) all to himself in this hit comedy from director Billy Wilder.

programme.title: The Iron Lady, (2011, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: OSCAR-winning Meryl Streep is Margaret Thatcher in this insightful and intimate portrait of the first and only female Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

programme.title: In The Bedroom, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: After a young man becomes romantically involved with an older single mother, his parents raise concern. Soon, the relationship takes a sudden and tragic turn, and his family is forced to confront the inescapable consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Blue Sky, (1994, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Uprooting his family after being assigned to a remote testing facility in Alabama, nuclear engineer Hank Marshall is faced with a moral decision as an opponent of the atmospheric tests he’s asked to complete.

programme.title: The Accused, (1988, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Jodie Foster gives an Oscar-winning performance as the hard, independent Sarah Tobias, who is assaulted in the back of a neighborhood bar. But that is only the beginning of her ordeal.

programme.title: Children of a Lesser God, (1986, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: One of the most critically-acclaimed films of the 80s, Children of a Lesser God garnered four Academy Award nominations and a Best Actress Oscar for Marlee Matlin.

programme.title: The Iron Lady, (2011, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: OSCAR-winning Meryl Streep is Margaret Thatcher in this insightful and intimate portrait of the first and only female Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Supercop (1996), (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Michelle Yeoh, and Maggie Cheung lead an action-packed classic with jaw-dropping stunts, from leaping out a ten-story building onto an airborne helicopter to landing on top of a speeding train.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: Crazy Six, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: In a crumbling Europe, powerful mafia families have emerged from the anarchy to vie for control of the lucrative arms trade.

programme.title: Over the Top, (1987, Adventure)
programme.desc: A Championship title, a huge cash award, and his son's love -- the greatest prize of all -- are at stake when Hawk battles his strongest enemy for everything he has ever wanted.

programme.title: Life Stinks, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unconventional comedy of non-stop laughs! Mel Brooks plays a billionaire who, on a bet, takes to the L.A. streets for one month and ends up with the education of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Buckaroo Banzai is a rock-star/brain-surgeon/comic-book-hero/samurai who along with his group, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil creatures from the 8th dimension (all named John) who are trying to conquer our dimension.

programme.title: Masters Of The Universe, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fantastic exploits of He-Man and his arch rival, the evil Skeletor, are brought to the big screen for the first time in this live-action adventure.

programme.title: Bio-Dome, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous Comedy, five brave scientists are forced to face life forms more perplexing, more terrifying, more annoying than anything they've ever encountered: Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: 31, (2016, Zombies)
programme.desc: From the visionary mind of Rob Zombie comes a story of five carnival workers who are kidnapped and forced to fight for their lives against an endless parade of homicidal maniacs.

programme.title: Maniac (2012), (2013, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Just when you thought the streets were safe, a serial killer is stalking beautiful coeds in this terrifying thriller starring Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Cooties, (2015, Zombies)
programme.desc: Teachers have the worst Monday ever when their students are turned into little killer savages in this horror comedy with unexpected laughs and unapologetic thrills.

programme.title: Horns, (2014, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man wakes up after the death of his girlfriend to find he has grown horns.

programme.title: Prowl, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A group of friends on their way to the big city are terrorized in an abandoned warehouse where bloodthirsty creatures hunt human prey.

programme.title: Rogue, (2008, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A rugged American adventure-travel journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile.

programme.title: Dark Tide, (2012, Action)
programme.desc:
Kate accepts a lucrative opportunity to lead a thrill-seeking millionaire businessman on a shark dive in the most dangerous waters, outside the cage.
PG-13

programme.title: Prey, (2007, Adventure)
programme.desc: While on holiday, an Amerian family are trapped by hungry lions in South Africa.

programme.title: Open Water, (2003, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: When a couple is stranded while scuba diving, they soon realize they are in the middle of shark-infested waters in this intense, critically acclaimed thriller.

programme.title: The Heavenly Kid, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Thou Shalt Be Cool with this totally awesome 80s classic when a helpless nerd (Jason Gedrick) gets divine intervention from a hip guardian angel (Lewis Smith) straight from the 1960s! Jane Kaczmarek, Nancy Valen and Richard Mulligan also star.

programme.title: Teen Witch, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: She-Devil, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The author of 32 best-selling romance books takes her accountant away from his frumpy wife. And when this overweight suburban wife discovers what's been going on, she wreaks malicious and delicious revenge...

programme.title: High Spirits, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When a castle-turned-hotel owned by Peter Plunkett falls on hard financial times, he comes up with an idea to turn the place into a tourist attraction by billing it as Europe's most haunted castle.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Hollywood Shuffle, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the style of KENTUCKY FRIED MOVIE, writer-director Robert Townsend lampoons Hollywood's perception of blacks--and racial stereotypes in general.

programme.title: UHF, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The manager of a small-time UHF station which has the lowest ratings in the country inadvertently hits it big with his strange programming ideas to keep Channel 62 from going down the tubes.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted “one of the 10 funniest movies ever made” by the American Film Institute, “Airplane!” is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Harrison Ford plays Linus Larrabee, a busy tycoon who has no room for love in his appointment book. When a romance between his playboy brother and Sabrina, daughter of the family chauffeur, threatens one of Linus’ business deals, he alters his schedule.

programme.title: Runaway Bride, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts plays a small-town girl whose marches down the aisle become a series of near Mrs. when she bolts before saying "I do."

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: In & Out, (1997, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A former student who's now an actor tells an audience of millions that Howard is gay. He's outed when he didn't know he was in! Kevin Kline plays Howard, scrambling to go forth with his wedding and doing his best to assert his manliness.

programme.title: The Butcher's Wife, (1991, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When butcher Leo returns from a fishing trip, he can't wait to show off his prize catch: his beautiful new wife, a country clairvoyant named Marina. But he soon hears about a psychic who turns hardened city dwellers into lovestruck kids.

programme.title: The Prince and Me, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A fairy tale love-story about a pre-med student who falls in love with a Danish Prince who refused to follow the traditions of his parents and has come to the US to rebel.

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: Harsh Times, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: An unstable Gulf War veteran with a savior complex receives a shocking wake-up call upon returning stateside and accepting a position with the Department of Homeland Security.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: Kill The Irishman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Downsizing, (2017, Dramedy)
programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.title: Nebraska, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: From Academy Award® winner Alexander Payne, comes the story of a father and his adult son who embark on a journey to claim a million-dollar prize. What begins as a fool’s errand becomes a search for the road to redemption.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: Regarding Henry, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Henry Turner is a New York lawyer who needs to win at any cost. But a single gunshot brings Henry’s fast-track rise to a dead stop, leaving him incapacitated and with no memory of the life he used to lead.

programme.title: Before I Go To Sleep, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

programme.title: Superstar, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: All Mary Katherine Gallagher wants in life is a kiss. Not just any kiss, mind you – a Hollywood-style kiss. But no matter how hard she tries, no one will kiss her. She decides that to get her kiss, she must become just like the people in the movies.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Superstar, (1999, Comedy)
